name: Vikings JumpIn 2: Plattformer and Run and Jump Game
name_original: Vikings JumpIn 2: Plattformer and Run and Jump Game
description:
It is a low poly action, platformer and run and jump game. Try to complete the levels before the time is up. Be careful though, because you have 3 lives and don't fall off the platforms.

You play a drunk Viking girl and try to make your way back to the pub. The game has 2 levels.

The game will receive updates for more levels in the future. Control is included in the game under the Control button. The game is perfect for relaxing from a hard day.
